word_mean: ［拉］喘鸣：一种刺耳的高音调呼吸声，如急性喉阻塞时常听到的吸气声。参见laryngismus stridulus

sentence.Network_en: Clinical presentation includes dyspnea at exertion, stridor, and wheezing.
sentence.Network_cn: 临床表现有劳力性呼吸困难 、 喘鸣等.

sentence.Network_en: Hypocalcemia can present dramatically as tetany seizures altered mental status or stridor.
sentence.Network_cn: 低血钙的症状是易于发现的,如手足抽搐、癫痫发作、神志改变禾郗鸣.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin, from stridere 'to creak'

means.word_mean: 1. a whistling sound when breathing (usually heard on inspiration); indicates obstruction of the trachea or larynx
